formulas.name: Kienzle Main Cutting Force
formulas.description: Main cutting force from specific cutting force

formulas.name: Corrected Cutting Force
formulas.equation: Fc_corr = Fc × Kγ × Kv × Kw × Kc × Kr

formulas.name: Merchant Shear Angle
formulas.description: Shear plane angle from Merchant theory

formulas.name: Chip Flow Angle
formulas.description: Chip flow direction in oblique cutting

formulas.name: Hybrid Physics-ML Force
formulas.description: Weighted combination of physics and ML prediction

formulas.name: Optimal Power Point
formulas.description: Power level minimizing cost per volume

formulas.name: Average Cutting Temperature
formulas.equation: θavg = θ0 + C × v^a × f^b × ap^c

formulas.name: Heat Partition to Chip
formulas.description: Fraction of heat going to chip

formulas.name: Chip Temperature
formulas.equation: θchip = θ0 + Rchip × Q / (ρ × c × MRR)

formulas.name: Cantilever Natural Frequency
formulas.description: First mode natural frequency of cantilever

formulas.name: Stability Limit (SDOF)
formulas.description: Limiting depth of cut for stability

formulas.name: Chatter Detection Index
formulas.description: Ratio of vibration to stable baseline

formulas.name: Scallop Height (Ball End)
formulas.description: Cusp height for ball end milling

formulas.name: Actual Ra
formulas.equation: Ra_actual = Ra_theo × Kw × Km × Kv × Ks

formulas.name: Tapered Tool Deflection
formulas.equation: δtaper = F × L³ / (3 × E) × 4/(π × D1³ × D2)

formulas.name: Chip Compression Ratio
formulas.description: Ratio of chip to uncut thickness

formulas.name: Johnson-Cook Flow Stress
formulas.description: Temperature and strain-rate dependent flow stress

formulas.name: Total Part Cost
formulas.equation: Cpart = Cmat + Cmach + Ctool + Csetup + COH

formulas.name: Pareto Dominance
formulas.equation: x1 ≺ x2 ⟺ ∀i: fi(x1) ≤ fi(x2) ∧ ∃j: fj(x1) < fj(x2)

formulas.name: S-Curve Profile Time
formulas.equation: t = t_jerk_in + t_accel + t_coast + t_decel + t_jerk_out

formulas.name: 5-Axis Tool Orientation
formulas.description: Tool axis vector from rotary axes

formulas.name: Effective Diameter
formulas.description: Effective diameter at ap for ball/bull

formulas.name: Stribeck Friction
formulas.equation: μ = μ0 + (μs - μ0) × exp(-v/vs) + kv × v

formulas.name: Combined Friction Model
formulas.equation: μ = μadh × fadh + μplow × fplow + μthird × fthird

formulas.name: RPM Calculator
formulas.description: Spindle RPM from cutting speed and tool diameter

formulas.name: Feed Rate Calculator
formulas.description: Table feed rate from RPM, feed per tooth, and flutes
formulas.formula_js: ({n_rpm, fz, z}) => ({ Vf: n_rpm * fz * z })

formulas.name: Cutting Speed from RPM
formulas.description: Cutting speed from tool diameter and RPM

formulas.name: Chip Thinning Compensation
formulas.description: Adjusted feed for radial chip thinning
formulas.formula_js: ({fz, D, ae}) => ({ fz_eff: fz * D / (2 * Math.sqrt(D * ae - ae * ae)) })

formulas.name: Torque from Power
formulas.description: Spindle torque from power and RPM

formulas.name: Thread Pitch to TPI
formulas.description: Convert metric pitch to threads per inch

formulas.name: Tap Drill Size (75%)
formulas.description: Approximate tap drill for 75% thread engagement

formulas.name: Machining Time
formulas.description: Cutting time from length and feed rate

formulas.name: Surface Speed (Turning)
formulas.description: Surface speed at given diameter for turning
